2500 x 1 = 2500
2500 x 2 = 5000
2500 x 3 = 7500
2500 x 4 = 10000
2500 x 5 = 12500
2500 x 6 = 15000
2500 x 7 = 17500
2500 x 8 = 20000
2500 x 9 = 22500
2500 x 10 = 25000

3 x 1 = 3
3 x 2 = 6
3 x 3 = 9
3 x 4 = 12
3 x 5 = 15
3 x 6 = 18
3 x 7 = 21
3 x 8 = 24
3 x 9 = 27
3 x 10 = 30
80 x 1 = 80
80 x 2 = 160
80 x 3 = 240
80 x 4 = 320
80 x 5 = 400
80 x 6 = 480
80 x 7 = 560
80 x 8 = 640
80 x 9 = 720
80 x 10 = 800
